title: Pset_AudioVisualApplianceTypePlayer
description: An audio-visual player is a device that plays stored media into a stream of audio and/or video, such as camera footage in security systems, background audio in retail areas, or media presentations in conference rooms or theatres.  HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PlayerMediaEject.title: PlayerMediaEject
PlayerMediaEject.description: Indicates whether the media can be ejected from the player (if physical media).
